abstract.text: A string array of the data to be included. The default is the empty array `[]`.  - `attachments`: Include attachments associated with the envelope. - `custom_fields`: Include the custom fields associated with the envelope. - `documents`: Include the documents associated with the envelope. - `extensions`: Include information about the email settings associated with the envelope. - `folders`: Include the folder where the envelope exists. - `payment_tabs`: Include the payment tabs associated with the envelope. - `powerform`: Include the PowerForms associated with the envelope. - `recipients`: Include the recipients associated with the envelope. - `tabs`: Include the tabs associated with the envelope.
This object lets you choose the data format of your Connect response. For  more information about using this object, see

A string array of the data to be included. The default is the empty array `[]`.  - `attachments`: Include attachments associated with the envelope. - `custom_fields`: Include the custom fields associated with the envelope. - `documents`: Include the documents associated with the envelope. - `extensions`: Include information about the email settings associated with the envelope. - `folders`: Include the folder where the envelope exists. - `payment_tabs`: Include the payment tabs associated with the envelope. - `powerform`: Include the PowerForms associated with the envelope. - `recipients`: Include the recipients associated with the envelope. - `tabs`: Include the tabs associated with the envelope.
